enWisdom: Piety is the most excellent attire

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ اللِّبَاسِ [الدِّينُ‏] الْوَرَعُ وَخَيْرُ الذُّخْرِ [الذِّكْرِ] التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: Piety is the best attire and the best provision is God-wariness
The garment of God-wariness is the most honourable of attires

Wisdom: مَنْ تَعَرَّى عَنِ الْوَرَعِ ادَّرَعَ جِلْبَابَ الْعَارِ
enWisdom: Whoever divests himself of piety puts on the attire of disgrace

Wisdom: مَنْ تَعَرَّى عَنْ لِبَاسِ التَّقْوَى لَمْ يَسْتَتِرْ بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ أَلْبَابِ [أَسْبَابِ‏] الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Whoever takes off the attire of God-wariness will not be able to cover himself with anything from the devices (and means) of this world

Wisdom: مَنْ تَسَرْبَلَ أَثْوَابَ التُّقَى لَمْ يَبْلَ سِرْبَالُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever puts on the attires of God-wariness, his garments will not get worn out
